name: @cloudflare/quick-edit
description: VSCode for Web hosted for use in Cloudflare's Quick Editor
author: workers-devprod@cloudflare.com

scripts.dev: ln -s $PWD/vscode $PWD/web/vscode && concurrently 'npx wrangler pages dev ./web' 'npm --prefix web/cloudflare-logic run watch-web' 'yarn --cwd vscode watch' 'yarn --cwd vscode watch-web'
